name: Toilet Safety Rails for Seniors, Adjustable & Foldable Toilet Frame for Elderly and Disabled, Handicap Toilet Handles Fits Any Toilet (350 lb)
short_description: 【Enhanced Stability & Safety】Crafted from corrosion-resistant aluminum frames, this safety rails offer exceptional durability and support a capacity of 350 pounds. They guarantee rigid support without any risk of bending or slipping.
【Foldable and Space-Saving】The foldable design allows the rails to collapse flat for effortless storage. Perfect for small bathrooms and for taking reliable support on the go.

【Adjustable Width & Height】The toilet assist devices with handles offers handle height adjustable from 26" to 31", and internal width from 20" to 26". Designed to accommodate users of different heights and fit a wide range of toilet sizes.

【Non-Slip Armrest & Rubber Feet】The toilet safety rail features non-slip armrests for reliable support when sitting or standing. Rubber feet securely grip the floor preventing slipping or shifting during use and helping seniors and those with limited mobility sit and stand more safely and easily.

【Tool-Free Assembly】The handicap toilet rails can be set up in just 3 minutes, with all hardware and tools included in the package. Along with clear, easy-to-follow instructions, ensuring you won’t need any additional tools for assembly.

UNIVERSAL FIT FOR MOST TOILETS: Designed for standard and elongated flat-tank toilets with a fixed/bolted seat. Great for helping you sit and stand safely, it's a great alternative to traditional toilet seat risers, elevated toilet seats, handicap grab bars, and raised toilet seats with handles.

VIVE LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Lifetime guarantee so you can purchase with confidence.
